MINI 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in MINI vehicles. Curious to know what MINI model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on MINI 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of MINI models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific MINI model changed across years or compare between different models of the MINI family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official MINI 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest MINI cars

MINI E Countryman 0-60 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 14.6 @ 90 mph
MINI Cooper S 0-60 5.9 - 8.4 sec 1/4 mile 14.4 @ 87 - 18.2 @ 55 mph
MINI Cooper 0-60 5.9 - 12.3 sec 1/4 mile 14.4 @ 82 - 19.2 @ 32 mph
MINI Hardtop 0-60 6 - 8.7 sec 1/4 mile 14.2 @ 102 - 17 @ 80 mph

MINI Coupe 0-60 6.2 - 8.8 sec 1/4 mile 15 @ 92 - 17 @ 82 mph
